text: @narendramodi @FinMinIndia Sir, we self employed are also sufferers of this pandemic. Our incomes have stopped . Don't have means to make payments. Plz instruct banks to defer our housing loan /mortgage loan EMIs for a couple of months. Banks will lose only a small portion of interests
